about_the_game:
Farm Invader brings back the charm of classic arcade games with a fresh twist—you’re an alien piloting a UFO on a mission to abduct cows and humans!

Boost your score by beaming up unsuspecting cows—just don’t draw too much attention to yourself. Each cow you abduct raises suspicion, slowly turning the once peaceful farm into a hotspot for human activity.

As suspicion rises, humans will start wandering around the farm, investigating the strange lights and sounds. Stay alert—getting caught can jeopardize your mission.

Humans might drop power-ups when they’re scared, but you’ll need to be quick. Use these bonuses to turn the tide in your favor, but don’t linger too long, or your cover might be blown! 

For an even bigger score boost, abduct humans! But beware—taking them will skyrocket your suspicion level, making it harder to stay under the radar. Keep an eye on your suspicion bar, which decreases over time, and balance your actions carefully to avoid being overwhelmed.

Leaderboards

The leaderboards track one thing and one thing only: how many abductions you’ve successfully performed. Every cow and human you beam up adds to your total score, so focus on precision and timing to climb the ranks.

Compete against other players and prove you’re the ultimate farm invader.

Power Ups

Master the art of abduction with these powerful upgrades:

• Score Multiplier: Amplify points per abduction and climb the leaderboards faster.

• Suspicion Suppressor: Reduce suspicion over time, giving you breathing room to strategize.

• Temporal Slowdown: Temporarily slow down the action during chaotic moments.

• Beam Magnetizer: Attract abductees directly to your UFO with increased efficiency.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with Vulkan 1.0 or OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with Vulkan 1.2 or OpenGL 4.6 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Pilot a UFO to abduct cows and humans in this retro arcade-style game! Boost your score while managing suspicion as humans roam the farm. Collect power-ups like score multipliers and time slowers to enhance your gameplay. Can you balance abductions and suspicion to achieve a high score?
